email_body: I will be there tomorrow, but I have a bunch of rehab exercises to do for my knee. I probably won't be much of a partner for a couple more weeks. -----Original Message----- From: Landry, Chad Sent: Monday, October 15, 2001 7:21 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: workout sorry i missed this morning. i was out of town this weekend and i just flew in this morning. Tomorrow morning I plan on running on the treadmill from 540 am - 600 am and working out with weights from 6 - 645 am. will you be there tomorrow? ckl
